content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LOBXFL
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: --STRESC
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000105
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --LOBXFL = 'Y' and --STRESC is empty.
Outcome:
  Message: --LOBXFL = 'Y', but --STRESC is empty.
  Output Variables:
    - --TESTCD
    - --CAT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0569
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Operationally-derived indicator used to identify the
                  last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC. Result value is in --STRESC.
                Document: Model 2.0
                Item: --STRESC
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --LOBXFL = 'Y' and --STRESC is empty.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Operationally-derived indicator used to identify the last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC. Result value is in --STRESC.
